member.name: T:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.MenuDisplayType
member.summary: Enumeration of Menu types supported by AccessPoint server control.

member.name: T:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.AccessPoint
member.summary: Access point server control. Used for accessing ediotr's menu for associated items like Content, Collections, and Folders.

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.AccessPoint.ObjectId
member.summary: Gets or sets the Id of the objectthis AccessPoint is associated with. This is directly related to the AccessMenu.DisplayType. If DisplayType is Content, ObjectId should be the Content ID the access point accesses.

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.AccessPoint.ContentType
member.summary: Gets or sets the ContentType for the content associated with the control. This will determine what type of content can be added through the access point.

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.AccessPoint.DisplayType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of menu that is being displayed. For example, COntent, Collection, or Folder.

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.AccessPoint.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the title of the object associated with the access point. This title will be used for display purposes for certain menu types (i.e. content).

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.AccessPoint.AddText
member.summary: Optional; sets the text to use in place of the default "Add HTML Content" message.

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.AccessPoint.DesignTime
member.summary: Determines if the control is being rendered in VisualStudio.NET

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.AccessPoint.FolderId
member.summary: Gets or sets the Folder ID where new contnet will be saved when using the access point. This is used when the DisplayType is Collection or Taxonomy and new conten tis added.

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.AccessPoint.IsPresentationServer
member.summary: Gets a flag indicating if the current server is a presentation server.

member.name: T:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.EditorsMenu
member.summary: Access point server control. Used for accessing ediotr's menu for associated items like Content, Collections, and Folders.

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.EditorsMenu.ObjectId
member.summary: Gets or sets the Id of the objectthis AccessPoint is associated with. This is directly related to the AccessMenu.DisplayType. If DisplayType is Content, ObjectId should be the Content ID the access point accesses.

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.EditorsMenu.ContentType
member.summary: Gets or sets the ContentType for the content associated with the control. This will determine what type of content can be added through the access point.

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.EditorsMenu.DisplayType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of menu that is being displayed. For example, COntent, Collection, or Folder.

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.EditorsMenu.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the title of the object associated with the access point. This title will be used for display purposes for certain menu types (i.e. content).

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.EditorsMenu.AddText
member.summary: Optional; sets the text to use in place of the default "Add HTML Content" message.

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.EditorsMenu.DesignTime
member.summary: Determines if the control is being rendered in VisualStudio.NET

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.EditorsMenu.FolderId
member.summary: Gets or sets the Folder ID where new contnet will be saved when using the access point. This is used when the DisplayType is Collection or Taxonomy and new conten tis added.

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.EditorsMenu.IsPresentationServer
member.summary: Gets a flag indicating if the current server is a presentation server.

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.CriteriaFilter`1.Field
member.summary: Gets or sets the field to filter on.

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.CriteriaFilter`1.Operator
member.summary: Gets or sets the operator to use for the filter.

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.CriteriaFilter`1.Value
member.summary: The value to filter on. The value should be the same data type as the corresponding property in the associated data class. For example, if Filtering on ContentProperty.Id, the value should be a long because ContentData.Id is a long. If using the CriteriaFilterOperator.In operator, the Value you should be an IEnumerable list of values.

member.summary: Filter class for defining Taxonomy filters for Content.

member.summary: Filter class for defining metadata filters for Content.

member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the metadata field to filter on. This or TypeId must be set.

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.ContentMetadataFilter.TypeId
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the metadata field to filter on. This or TypeName must be set.

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.ContentMetadataFilter.Operator
member.summary: Gets or sets the operator to use for the filter.

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.ContentMetadataFilter.Value
member.summary: The value to filter on. The value should be the same data type as the corresponding property in the associated data class. For example, if Filtering on ContentProperty.Id, the value should be a long because ContentData.Id is a long. If using the CriteriaFilterOperator.In operator, the Value you should be an IEnumerable list of values.

member.summary: Class representing filter options for Menu Trees.

member.summary: Gets or sets the Id of the tree you wish to retreive.

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.TreeFilter.Depth
member.summary: Gets or sets the depth of the tree you wish to retrieve. 0 will retrieve the entire tree.

member.summary: The SortableSearchProperty class describes an index field on which a set of query results can be sorted.

member.summary: The SearchProperty is a data structure identifying a individual index field.

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.SearchProperty.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name the specific index field on which to sort a set of query results.

member.summary: Gets or sets the name the name displayed in the UI represnting this property.

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.SortableSearchProperty.Direction
member.summary: Gets or sets the value identifying the direction in which query results should be sorted.

member.summary: The RankSearchProperty identifies a rank field on which to sort query results.

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.RankSearchProperty.RankId
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID for the rank profile that should be applied when processing the relevance of query results. (Not available in all search providers.)

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.SearchController.AdvancedQueryText
member.summary: Gets or sets the query text used by Search to query the index and to refine and narrow search parameters.

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.SearchController.EnableAutoSuggest
member.summary: Gets or sets the feature which displays query completions/suggestions (based on the currently configured Search provider) in the Search control.

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.SearchController.AutoSuggestMaxCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum count of query completions/suggestions displayed in the search control. Note: This is the suggested maximum count of suggestions returned by the search engine. The actual number of suggestions received may vary based on the index and the Search provider.

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.SearchController.EnableAutoComplete
member.summary: Gets or sets the feature which displays query completions/suggestions (based on the currently configured Search provider) in the Search control.

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.SearchController.AutoCompleteMaxCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum count of query completions/suggestions displayed in the search control. Note: This is the suggested maximum count of suggestions returned by the search engine. The actual number of suggestions received may vary based on the index and the Search provider.

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.SearchController.EnableQueryStatistics
member.summary: Gets or sets the feature which logs query statistics (based on the Search provider).

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.ProductSearchController.AdvancedQueryText
member.summary: Gets or sets the query text used by Windows Search to query the index and to refine and narrow search parameters.

member.name: T:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.Views.ContentView
member.summary: ContentView is the server control.

member.name: M:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.Views.DesignTypeConverterCLV.GetStandardValues(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext)
member.summary: The GetStandardValues method returns the list of designs specified for the control. It gets this list by reading ControlDesigns.xml (which is located in the bin directory). It also has to get the Ektron namespace Uri and prefix from web.config.

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.Views.DesignTypeConverterCLV.ControlType
member.summary: This property should be overridden in the inheriting control and the get should include the name of the control. The Design property in the control class should specify the name of the inheriting class as it's TypeConverter. Example, the Design property in the ContentListSummary Control has the following: [TypeConverter(typeof(ContentListSummaryTypeConverter))] - and ContentListSummaryTypeConverter inherits from DesignTypeConverter and overrides this property to return the string "ContentListSummary"

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.Views.DesignTypeConverterCLV.SitePath
member.summary: Returns the installation path of CMS400 as a Uri (e.g. file://C:/Inetpub/wwwroot/CMS400Demo/) Note the trailing slash is present!

member.name: M:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.Views.DesignTypeConverter.GetStandardValues(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext)
member.summary: The GetStandardValues method returns the list of designs specified for the control. It gets this list by reading ControlDesigns.xml (which is located in the bin directory). It also has to get the Ektron namespace Uri and prefix from web.config.

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.Views.DesignTypeConverter.ControlType
member.summary: This property should be overridden in the inheriting control and the get should include the name of the control. The Design property in the control class should specify the name of the inheriting class as it's TypeConverter. Example, the Design property in the ContentListSummary Control has the following: [TypeConverter(typeof(ContentListSummaryTypeConverter))] - and ContentListSummaryTypeConverter inherits from DesignTypeConverter and overrides this property to return the string "ContentListSummary"

member.name: P:Ektron.Cms.Framework.UI.Controls.Views.DesignTypeConverter.SitePath
member.summary: Returns the installation path of CMS400 as a Uri (e.g. file://C:/Inetpub/wwwroot/CMS400Demo/) Note the trailing slash is present!
